Cyber Arts Camp

navigateleftStyle

Construct

Intro to Electronics navigateright

Transmission

Today is a big day. We’re going to learn about upcycling. Upcycling is an important way that we live sustainably. Next we will start constructing the dome using the stylized triangles from yesterday.

Ascent Checklist

  • Clean workspace
  • Scissors
  • Glue
  • (Optional) Stapler

Links

  • Habitat for Humanity - Read about how Habitat for Humanity, one of our favorite non profits, uses upcycling in their programs.

Tips

  • Fold tabs along the black lines.

  • Count out five triangles and arrange them in a circle. Glue the tabs to one another. Continue doing so until you have glued together all the primary triangles into 6 pentagons.

  • Glue takes time to dry, remember to hold the freshly glued tabs together for a few moments to ensure a secure connection.

  • To add porosity to your dome, experiment cutting the tips of the triangles off.

Mission

  • Construct Your Dome - Follow the instructions in the video and glue together your dome. Take your time, be precise, and let the glue try to ensure a solid structure.

  • Upcycle Something - Begin collecting upcycling materials from around your house. Cardboard, bubble wrap, plastic containers, egg cartons etc. See if you can upcycle any of these materials to continue building structures around your Mars home dome.

Flipcards

Upcycling

Upcycling is to use materials you already have, and with some creativity, transforming them into new objects and products. Reusing discarded objects of materials in such a way as to create a product of higher quality or value than the original.

Recycle

To recycle is to convert waste into reusable material. Use again, or return a material to previous stage in the cyclic process.

Relief sculpture

A relief sculpture is a three Dimensional elements are raised from a flat base, giving it dimension.

Terraforming

To terraform is to transform an alien planet to resemble Earth so that it can support human life.

Planar Polygon

A planar polygon is a plane figure with at least 3 straight sides or angles, typically more than 5.

Polyhedron

A polyhedron solid figure with many plane faces, typically more than 6.

Scale

Scale is the size of a structure. A scale figure is a representation of a human figure that when placed next to a structure can give you an idea of how big the structure is.

Craftsmanship

Craftsmanship are skills that someone uses when constructing beautiful things by hand.
